function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation in healthcare facilities leading to increased risk of tuberculosis transmission","Impact":"Higher risk of tuberculosis transmission for healthcare workers and patients","Mitigation":"Installation of effective ventilation systems, regular maintenance, and monitoring of ventilation performance","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC systems, ventilation louvers, upper ventilation windows, courtyard designs for integrated ventilation","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, visitors","Owner":"Facility managers, architects, building owners"},{"Description":"Spread of communicable infections like coronavirus due to poor ventilation in public spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of widespread infection in offices, schools, and hospitals","Mitigation":"Implementation of normal ventilation, pressurization, filtration, dilution, nanotechnology, and purification technologies","Technologies":"Normal ventilation systems, pressurization systems, filtration systems, nanotechnology-based air purification, dilution techniques","People":"Employees, students, patients, visitors","Owner":"Facility managers, school administrators, hospital administrators"},{"Description":"Need for suitable ventilation rates and open-ended corridors in hospital buildings","Impact":"Inadequate ventilation leading to poor air circulation and increased risk of infection transmission","Mitigation":"Incorporation of open-ended corridors, installation of ventilation louvers, provision of upper ventilation windows, utilization of courtyard designs for integrated ventilation","Technologies":"Ventilation louvers, upper ventilation windows, courtyard ventilation designs","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Architects, building designers, facility managers"}]}
